activities: SurveyMonkey Inc. collects, stores and processes personal data from users, survey panel members and other survey respondents within the EU, EEA, and Switzerland to provide those users and other customers with a variety of personalized products and services primarily related to online surveys.  This includes the transfer of customer personal data from EU SurveyMonkey subsidiaries to SurveyMonkey Inc. located in the United States.  Human resources data is also transferred from EU SurveyMonkey subsidiaries to SurveyMonkey Inc. for the purposes of conducting HR, financial, and other administrative management of the SurveyMonkey group of companies.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: TRUSTe EU Safe Harbor Program and Web Privacy Program
recoursemech: For human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); For all other types of data:  TRUSTe (EU Safe Harbor Program)
